docs.summary: APIs for getting/setting the consent policy of our Users and the Users of Users

params.name: paging.offset
params.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

params.name: dateRange.startDate
params.doc: Return policies that were created after this date (inclusive).

params.name: dateRange.endDate
params.doc: Return policies that were created before this date (inclusive).

docs.summary:
Retrieves a list of consent policies, given the provided filters.

> **Permissions**  
> This endpoint requires the Manage Your App [permission scope](https://devforum.wix.com/en/article/available-permissions).

examples.title: List Policies

extra.description: Retrieves a list of consent policies, given the provided filters.

params.name: paging.offset
params.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

params.name: dateRange.startDate
params.doc: Return policies that were created after this date (inclusive).

params.name: dateRange.endDate
params.doc: Return policies that were created before this date (inclusive).

docs.summary:
Retrieves a list of consent policies, given the provided filters.

> **Permissions**  
> This endpoint requires the Manage Your App [permission scope](https://devforum.wix.com/en/article/available-permissions).

examples.title: List Policies

extra.description: Retrieves a list of consent policies, given the provided filters.

docs.summary: The full consent policy with all included fields

members.name: userAgent
members.doc: The browser User Agent from which the request was sent, taken from the request

members.name: timestamp
members.doc: Policy signature timestamps.

members.name: expiry
members.doc: Policy expiration timestamps.

members.name: ip4
members.doc: Signer IP as identified in our system, in V4 format.

members.name: location
members.doc: URL from which this call was made (referer)

members.name: domain
members.doc: Domain from which this call was made (taken from referer / origin)

members.name: consentee
members.doc: All known IDs on this call in the browser at the time consent

members.name: metaSiteId
members.doc: MetaSite ID this call was made from (if one exists)

members.name: policy
members.doc: Policy info.

docs.summary: The information about the consentee at the time of signing

members.name: visitorId
members.doc: Visitor ID.

members.name: siteMemberId
members.doc: Member ID.

members.name: userId
members.doc: Wix User ID.

members.name: clientId
members.doc: Client ID of anonymous visitor on wix.com (Funnel Cases)

docs.summary: The  policy the user agreed to

members.name: essential
members.doc: Essential to website operation.

members.name: functional
members.doc: Related to performance and other functional measurements.

members.name: analytics
members.doc: Related to analytics about how the site is used in order to improve it.

members.name: advertising
members.doc: Related to allowing better customization of the experience to a current visitor.

members.name: dataToThirdParty
members.doc: CCPA compliance flag.

members.name: limit
members.doc: Number of items to load.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

members.name: count
members.doc: Number of items returned in the response.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Offset that was requested.

members.name: total
members.doc: Total number of items that match the query.

members.name: tooManyToCount
members.doc: Flag that indicates the server failed to calculate the `total` field.

members.name: identity
members.doc: ID to check

members.name: visitorId
members.doc: Visitor ID.

members.name: siteMemberId
members.doc: Member ID.

members.name: userId
members.doc: Wix User ID.

members.name: clientId
members.doc: Client ID of an anonymous visitor on wix.com (Funnel Cases).

members.name: consents
members.doc: Consent info.

members.name: paging
members.doc: Paging info.

members.name: dateRange
members.doc: Policy creation date (optional).

members.name: startDate
members.doc: Return policies that were created after this date (inclusive).

members.name: endDate
members.doc: Return policies that were created before this date (inclusive).

members.name: consents
members.doc: Consent policies, limited to 100.

members.name: metaData
members.doc: Metadata regarding pagination.

members.name: consentPolicy
members.doc: Consent policy as defined by the user.

members.name: baseUrl
members.doc: Optional baseUrl if you have one - viewer use cases.

members.name: location
members.doc: Current URL in the browser when consent was set.

members.name: consent
members.doc: Full consent data including what we marked on the request
